metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42114 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[Exim NTLM Challenge Out-Of-Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-42114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
exim4-base - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
exim4-config - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
exim4-daemon-light - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
eximon4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: eslerm> no security patches available, see ZDI's timeline allenpthuang> patches now available, see the thread on Openwall

criterions.comment: exim4 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.90.1-1ubuntu1.10+esm1').
